entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
